notesStmt.note: In English, with Latin text in margin.
English text begins: This is the boke of the wars of God whiche was shewed from the Angell of God almighti, most high vnto Elizabeth the ha[n]d mayden of Christe ...
Attributed to Elizabeth of Schönau by STC (2nd ed.).
Publisher and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
"Lacks prelims., which may never have been printed"--STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: signatures C₈, H₁ and H₈ lacking.
Reproduction of original in the Ushaw College (Durham, England). Library.
